# name

**Instance Property**

A name that uniquely identifies this joint among others on the same skeleton.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: HandSkeleton.JointName { get }
```

## Inspecting hand joints

- **parentJoint**: The joint that’s connected to this joint and more closely connected to the base of the skeleton.
